title: FIFA World Cup : players with most matches 1930 to 2018
summary: The statistic ranks a ranking of the leading players of the most matches 1930 of World Cup as of 2019 , based on Number appearances .
As of 2019 , the Colombian attacking midfielder Lothar_Matthäus_(Germany) was the World Cup Player in the most 1930 , with a Number appearances of approximately 25 million appearances .
Davidson Miroslav_Klose_(Germany) ranked second , with a appearances of over 24 million appearances .
gold: This graph depicts the soccer players with the most appearances at the FIFA World Cup from 1930 to 2018 . The German midfielder , Lothar Matthäus , tops the list , having made 25 appearances at the World Cup between 1982 and 1998 .
